definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
heroine (of a novel or film)/main female protagonist

sentences.english: Never far from her work, the mistress of the web patiently waits.
sentences.chinese: 蛛網的女主人永遠守在自己的作品邊，耐心的等候。

sentences.english: A hostess apologized to her guest for serving a pie without any cheese.
sentences.chinese: 女主人爲餡餅裏沒放奶酪向客人道歉。

sentences.english: Barking deliriously, the dog bounded towards his mistress .
sentences.chinese: 那隻狗興奮地狂吠着向女主人跑去。

sentences.english: The special dessert the hostess prepared made a tremendous hit with everyone at the party.
sentences.chinese: 女主人做的甜點心在晚會上大受歡迎。

sentences.english: Goodwife asks famous tenor singer Simier sings a lyric song.
sentences.chinese: 女主人請聞名男高音歌唱家斯米爾唱一首抒情歌曲。

sentences.english: The hostess asked me to sit next to Mrs. Rumbold.
sentences.chinese: 女主人安排我坐在蘭伯爾德夫人的身旁邊。

sentences.english: One last word of farewell , dear Master and Mistress .
sentences.chinese: 親愛的男主人和女主人，這是我告別的最後一番話。

sentences.english: Then they went on to express their thanks to the hostess for her delicately arranged flowers.
sentences.chinese: 接着他們對女主人精心的插花表示感謝。

sentences.english: The hostess ladled out a bowl of tomato soup.
sentences.chinese: 女主人端上了一碗番茄湯。

sentences.english: The young man's maladroit remarks about the hostess embarrassed everyone at the party.
sentences.chinese: 這年輕人對女主人笨拙的批評讓與會者覺得很尷尬。

sentences.english: What if she becomes the mistress of the house in your absence?
sentences.chinese: 你不在的時候，要是她成了那房子的女主人怎麼辦？

sentences.english: The guest of honour is seated on the right side of the hostess.
I held the mistress's post in making tea and carving;
sentences.chinese: 我代替女主人，做倒茶切肉的事。

sentences.english: During the dinner conversation, it's customary to compliment the hostess on the wonderful meal.
sentences.chinese: 用餐時，習慣上人們會稱讚女主人烹調的美食。

sentences.english: The hostess circulated among her guests.
sentences.chinese: 女主人周旋於賓客之間。

definition: (neologism) (coll.) pet owner (lit. "official in charge of cleaning up poop")
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
